verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:1
verses.text: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:2
verses.text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:3
verses.text: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:4
verses.text: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:5
verses.text: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
